results.title: nexss -help
results.result:
List of quick/helper (-) functions
-arg-progress.md - Displays available colors for .nexss files
-bg.md - Starts nexss in the background.
-dev-colors.md - Disable colorized output result
-dev-help.md - shows help for devs like constants, paths tips and tricks
-dev-update.md - Updates code to the branch of the choice.
-dev-validation.md - Displays available validation for use in \_nexss.yml.
-env.md - Displays os, distro name, versions and package managers..
-global-config.md - Displays variables in the global config
-help.md - This help info
-output-colors.md - Displays available colors for .nexss files
-pack.md - Pack selected files and folders eg. nexss -pack myfile1 myfolder2 myfile3 mypack.tar.gz
-version.md - Shows version of the Nexss Programmer.

Programmer 2.5.17, NodeJS v14.16.1, OS: win32 10.0.19042  
nexss command add|a Add a new command to the project.
nexss command Execute a command eg. `nexss cmd findUpdatedFiles`.
nexss command delete|d Deletes defined command from the `_nexss.yml` config file.
nexss command list|l List of the available commands.
nexss config get|g Prints config settings from the `_nexss.yml`.
nexss config path returns path to the current config.
nexss config set|s Sets a config data in the config file `_nexss.yml`.
nexss file add|a Adds a new file to the project (with template selection)
nexss file delete|rm Deletes files from the nexss programmer project.
nexss file list|l List of the files in the nexss programmer project/package.
nexss language format1 Creates a folder with logos and json file with all the languages.
nexss language installed|i List of the installed languages.
nexss language list|l List of the all implemented languages.
nexss language status|s Get changes not staged, untracked files on all languages. (For Developers)
nexss language update|u Updates the installed languages to the latest version.
nexss package add|a Adds nexss package to the actual folder.
nexss package init All installed packages have 'init' command run: `nexss cmd init`
nexss package install Install packages
nexss package list|l Lists/search for available packages installed globally.
nexss package pack Packs the packages as dist.
nexss package update|u Updates all packages from the repositories.
nexss project attach|a Attach a project (and adds to the global list)
nexss project info|i Info about project with statistics eg nexss p info
nexss project new|n Adds a new project
nexss project remove|rm Remove a project from the central base of projects.
nexss project search|s Search through attached projects.
results.testBody: nexss help shouldContain -> /nexss command(.*)nexss config(.*)nexss file(.*)nexss language(.*)nexss project(.*)/s

results.title: Help per core package
results.result:
# Add

Adds a new file to the project (with template selection)

## Examples

    nexss file add my.pl
    nexss f add my.php
    nexss f a myfile.java --noconfig # it will create file but not add to the config
    nexss file add myfile1.js -f -t=helloWorld # will choice the helloWorld Template. -f for overwrite existing file (be careful)

Each language has own separate templates. If you wrote extension .pl - then Perl templates will be displayed, other extension, other language's templates.
results.testBody: nexss file add help shouldContain -> /Adds a new file to the project \(with template selection\)/

# Id - Nexss PROGRAMMER 2.x

Generates unique id

## Example

    nexss Id # will store new id in the nxsOut field
    nexss Id --nxsAs=myfield # will store the id in the myfield
